options.label: B
options.text: Delayed clamping, cutting and ligation of cord

questions.text: A 26-year-old woman, who had a previous pregnancy complicated by a neural tube defect in her infant, is planning another pregnancy. What is the appropriate prophylactic folic acid regimen for her?

options.label: B
options.text: 4 mg daily from 1 month before conception to 12 weeks of pregnancy

options.label: D
options.text: 1 mg daily with iron and a nutritious diet

questions.correct_answer: B. 4 mg daily from 1 month before conception to 12 weeks of pregnancy
